description: Security-focused reviewers override preset. Requests reviewers for security-related updates
so Renovate PRs have consistent review coverage. It passes through up to two optional
reviewers via preset arguments: {{arg0}} and {{arg1}}. Each argument may be a single user
(e.g., 'octocat') or a team using the 'team:' prefix (e.g., 'team:security-managers').
